mapper.update: update tbl_message set opendate = now() where mid= #{mid}
mapper.select: select sum(amount) from led_ledger group by category having category =#{category}
select COALESCE(SUM(amount),0) from led_ledger where category = #{category} and date(regdate) like #{date} and divide = 0
select COALESCE(SUM(amount),0) from led_ledger where month(regdate) =#{month} and year(regdate)="2017"

SELECT L.num AS num, L.boardnum AS boardNum, L.divide AS divide, L.category AS category, L.context AS context, L.amount AS amount, L.regdate AS regdate FROM led_ledger L, led_board B WHERE L.boardnum =#{boardNum} AND L.boardnum = B.num ORDER BY L.num DESC
mapper.insert: insert into led_ledger (boardNum, divide, category, context, amount) values (#{boardNum}, #{divide}, #{category}, #{context}, #{amount})
mapper.update: update led_ledger set divide = #{divide}, category = #{category}, context = #{context}, amount = #{amount} where num = #{num}

UPDATE led_ledger L INNER JOIN led_board B ON B.num = L.boardnum SET B.total = COALESCE((SELECT SUM(COALESCE(L.amount,0)) FROM led_ledger WHERE L.divide LIKE 1 AND L.boardnum LIKE #{boardNum}),0) - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(COALESCE(L.amount,0)) FROM led_ledger WHERE L.divide LIKE 0 AND L.boardnum LIKE #{boardNum}),0) WHERE L.boardnum LIKE #{boardNum};
